name: Sensei Showdown
description:
In order to be the best, you have to defeat the best!!

Submission for the Games Plus James Jam 2021.  Theme "You're The Best!"

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Keyboard Controls: 

move: WASD || jump: Space || shoot: M / CTRL / Mouse

Gamepad Controls:

move: joystick || jump: button south || shoot: button west

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Game design by Tim Kafalas 

timkaf.com

Music by Steven Huang
